thread.title: Portuguese referee violently assaulted by angry fan with giant plank
thread.title_full: Portuguese referee violently assaulted by angry fan with giant plank

title: Portuguese referee violently assaulted by angry fan with giant plank
text:
Portuguese referee violently assaulted by angry fan with giant plank Getty 0 12 Mar 2017 18:12:54 Check out the footage from the aftermath of the Portuguese lower tier then ask yourself: who would want to be a referee? 
Luis Fonseca, referee of the Viseu Football Association, was attacked by a fan in the aftermath of last Sunday's 1-1 clash between Vila Cha de Sa and Molelos. 
The game, which saw hosts' goalscorer Jorge handed a red card in the 94th minute, included officiating that left one fan incensed to the point of dragging Fonseca from his car following the game's conclusion.
